thread.title: Paddy Power, Betfair Agree $8 billion Sports-Betting Merger
thread.title_full: Paddy Power, Betfair Agree $8 billion Sports-Betting Merger - WSJ

author: Rory Gallivan
title: Paddy Power, Betfair Agree $8 billion Sports-Betting Merger
text:
LONDON—Paddy Power PLC and Betfair Group PLC have agreed to a near $8 billion merger to create an international sports-betting and online-gambling group with leading positions in the U.K., other parts of Europe and Australia.
Shareholders in Dublin-listed Paddy Power would own 52% of the merged company and receive an €80 million ($89.3 million) special dividend, while London-listed Betfair’s shareholders would own 48%, the companies...
